cause.description:
The Anxiety Disorders Association of America (ADAA) is the leading national nonprofit organization dedicated to increasing awareness and improving the diagnosis, treatment, and cure of anxiety disorders through education and research. ADAA offers free educational information and resources about anxiety disorders, local treatment providers, self-help groups, self-tests, clinical trials, and more. ADAA promotes the message that anxiety disorders are real, serious, and treatable.
For more information about anxiety disorders and related health conditions, visit www.adaa.org.
1. ADAA promotes awareness among the public, health care professionals, and the media that anxiety disorders are real, serious, and treatable.
2. The organization helps people with anxiety disorders find appropriate treatment and develop self-help skills.
3. ADAA encourages the early diagnosis, treatment, and cure of anxiety disorders through research.
4. The organization works to reduce the stigma of mental illness.
cause.mission: The Anxiety Disorders Association of America is a national nonprofit dedicated to the prevention, treatment and cure of anxiety disorders and to improving the lives of all people who suffer from them.
